page.title: 15MANOR FARM
page.content: MR APPLEWHITE HAS BEEN IN THE FARMING BUSINESS FOR 44 YEARS AND HIS FAMILY HAS BEEN IN FOR A 110_120 YEARS.HE GETS UP AT 6_30 AM.AND HE HAS 760 ACRES HE HAS SIX WORKERS INCUEDING HIMSELF AND HE HAS 2 /STONE BARNS AND 6 NEW BARNS HE HAS 40 TO 50 FARMS MECHINERY AND IT COSTS 120/1000 pounds the crop rotaition is evey 5 years sugerbeat oil seed RAPE IS CRUSHED FOR OIL MR APPLEWHITE HAS 2 COMBINES AND 2 FOUR WHEEL DIVE TRAKTORS THE OIL SEED RAPE IS PLANTED IN EACH FIELD ONCE EVEY 5 YEARS THE FURTLISER IS PINK SO THE FARMER CAN SEE THEM HE HAS 2HORSES AND THE FARMER HAS TWO MORE FARMS THE FOUR WHEEL DRIVE TRACTORS AND RUN ON DESIL ENGINE SIXTY HORSE POWER.
